participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and supportive, Emily enjoys engaging in meaningful conversations and encouraging others.
participant_1.background: I like to garden. I graduated college for secondary english education. I am a teacher. I have three children.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and competitive, Jake loves sports and enjoys spending time with his friends.
participant_2.background: I like to play soccer. I am seven years old. I just got my rejection letter from the gifted program. And, my best friend is Cayden.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I'm a teacher and I like to garden. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer and I just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.
That's too bad about the gifted program, but I'm sure you're a great kid. What's your favorite thing about soccer?
I like running around and scoring goals. I'm the best player on my team.
I'm sure you are! I'm impressed that you're already playing soccer at such a young age.
My best friend Cayden is on my team too.
That's great! It's always nice to have a friend on your team.
So, what else do you like to do for fun besides soccer?
I like to play with my friends, watch TV, and go to the park.
Those sound like fun things to do. I like to garden, read, and cook.
I like to read too. My favorite book is Harry Potter.
That's a great book! I'm a big fan of the Harry Potter series too.
Yeah, it's so good! I've read all of the books and watched all of the movies.
I have too! I'm excited for the new movie that's coming out next year.
Me too! I can't wait to see what happens.
Me neither! It's going to be great.
